question: Will 'Morbius' gross $50 million or more on opening weekend in the USA?
description:
This is a market on how much 'Morbius' (to be released on April 1, 2022) will gross domestically (in the USA) on the opening weekend. Opening weekend is defined as the first Friday, Saturday, and Sunday of the film's release. 

The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/release/rl2064025089/ will resolve this market when checked on April 4 2022, 9 PM ET. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Morbius' grossed $50,000,000 or more and to "No" otherwise.

If the box office sales data is a studio estimate, or if there is no data available, the source will be checked every 24 hours until there is conclusive data. If data is not available 1 week after the first check, this market will resolve 50/50.

question: Will the top song on Spotify Charts hit 30.5M global streams for the week ending on March 24?
description:
This is a market on a number of times the #1 song will be streamed globally by Spotify on the week ending March 24, 2022.

The resolution source for this market will be Spotify Charts (https://charts.spotify.com/), which ranks the most popular songs streamed by Spotify, on the Weekly Top Songs Global list, filtered by "Weekly", and "Week of Mar 24"

This market will resolve to "Yes" if at least one song will have 30,500,000 or more recorded global weekly streams, for the week ending on March 24. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This source will be checked on March 25, 2022 (12:00 PM ET), and every 24 hours thereafter if data is not available. If the data isn't available for the week following the resolution date, this market will resolve 50/50.

-----------------

Note, the stream count you see in charts might look different from the app and Spotify for Artists.

Spotify generates chart stream numbers using a special formula that protects the integrity of charts, and makes sure all voices of the users are reflected. It means not every stream on Spotify is eligible for Charts. Some songs may have fewer chart-eligible streams than others, depending on streaming behavior.

question: Will "peace" hit its Google Trends all time high (global, monthly) before June 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the search phrase for "peace" will reach its highest monthly Google Trends rank for global searches, as measured by Google Trends, between the date of this market's inception (March 17, 2022) and May 31, 2022. 

The resolution source for this market will be Google Trends data for the search phrase "peace", by worldwide users. Specifically, the average for the calendar month will be used, which can be accessed in detail via the downloadable CSV file, https://trends.google.com/trends/explore?date=all&q=peace. Note that the integer-rounded averages will be used, as shown in the 'Interest over time' box.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if, according to the resolution source, "peace" has been searched the most in March 2022, April 2022 or in May 2022 compared to any other month since January 2004. If the search rank for either March 2022, April 2022 or May 2022 is tied with other months for the highest, it will still suffice to resolve this market to "Yes."

The resolution source will be checked on April 5, 12 PM ET, May 5, 2022, 12 PM ET, and June 5, 2022, 12 PM ET, checking the averages for the months March, April and May respectively.

question: Formula 1: Who will finish ahead at the Bahrain Grand Prix: Max Verstappen or Lewis Hamilton?
description:
This is a market on the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Bahrain Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Lewis Hamilton. The race takes place over 57 laps of the 5.412-kilometre Bahrain International Circuit in Sakhir on Sunday, March 20.

The market will resolve to “Max Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Lewis Hamilton, and “Lewis Hamilton” if Lewis Hamilton finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Lewis Hamilton finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Lewis Hamilton.” 
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Lewis Hamilton does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Max Verstappen.” 
- If neither Lewis Hamilton nor Max Verstappen finish the race before March 30 (11 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the Bahrain Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before March 30, 2022, the same market conditions will apply.

question: Oscars 2022: Will Jessica Chastain win Best Actress?
description:
The Academy Award for Best Actress is an award presented annually at The 94th Academy Awards ceremony, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences. It is given to an actress who has delivered an outstanding performance in a leading role in a film released that year, and is scheduled to take place in Los Angeles on March 27, 2022. The nominations were announced on February 8, 2022.  

This is a market on whether Jessica Chastain will win the Academy Award for Best Actress at the 94th Academy Awards (“Oscars”), scheduled to take place on Sunday, March 27 2022. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Jessica Chastain wins the award for Best Actress at the 94th Academy Awards, and “No” if she does not win this award. 

If for any reason the winner is not announced by April 27 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve 50-50. The resolution source will be the television broadcast of the awards and the Oscars website (https://www.oscars.org/oscars/ceremonies/2022) and the award database (http://awardsdatabase.oscars.org/).

question: Will Bitcoin (BTC) reach its all-time high in 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Bitcoin (BTC) reaches a price above $69,044.77, according to Coingecko, in the market duration time: after March 17 and on or before December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. 
Otherwise, it will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be the 30-min candlestick high prices from Coingecko https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bitcoin (specifically, this market will resolve to "Yes", if at least one of the 30-min candlestick has a high price above $69,044.77, within the market duration time). If Coingecko is unavailable on the settlement date, a consensus of other credible sources will be used.

question: Will 'Morbius' get a 85% or higher Tomatometer Score?
description:
This market will resolve to 'Yes' if, as checked on the resolution date, the 'Morbius' movie will be given 85% or higher Tomatometer rating at Rotten Tomatoes, and 'No' otherwise.

The resolution source (Tomatometer All Critics Score rating at Rotten Tomatoes' movie profile: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/morbius) for this market will be checked on the resolution date - April 4 2022 at 12:00 PM ET.

---------------

'Morbius' will be released worldwide in theaters on April 1.

Rotten Tomatoes' Tomatometer is the percentage of all Approved Tomatometer Critics who have given this movie a positive review.

---------------

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 12 hours, until the actual data is available.

If the data is not available on the resolution source by April 7 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50.

question: Oscars 2022: Will any film win 6 or more awards?
description:
The 94th Academy Awards ceremony, presented by the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences (AMPAS), will honor the best films released between March 1 and December 31, 2021, and is scheduled to take place at the Dolby Theatre in Hollywood, Los Angeles, California, on March 27, 2022. The nominations were announced on February 8, 2022.  

This market will resolve to "Yes" if any film wins awards in 6 or more categories at The 94th Academy Awards. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note that only the regular “Award of Merit” categories count for this market. Neither any special award nor "Oscars Fan Favorite" will be considered toward this market’s resolution. Presently, the Academy Awards ceremony has 23 regular categories, each of which is to be won by a specific movie. If, for example, B. Cumberbatch wins Best Actor for his role as Phil Burbank, the Oscar for 'The Power of the Dog' is counted.

If for any reason the winners are not announced by April 27 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve 50-50. The resolution source will be the television broadcast of the awards and the Oscars website (https://www.oscars.org/oscars/ceremonies/2022) and the award database (http://awardsdatabase.oscars.org/).

question: Will Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Vladimir Putin meet in person before June 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy and President of the Russian Federation Vladimir Putin meet in person between March 17, 2022, and May 31, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET). This market will resolve to "Yes" if Volodymyr Zelenskyy and Vladimir Putin meet in person at any point between between March 17, 2022, and May 31, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

"In person" in particular means not via phone, video chat, etc. The meeting must take place with both men in the same location, at the same time.

The primary resolution sources for this market will be president.gov.ua/en, en.kremlin.ru, and/or information from other official webpages and verified accounts from the governments of the Ukraine and the Russian Federation, however other credible reporting may also be considered.
